lines.text: Set the angular acceleration to launch the rocket

secText:
Lesson:
1. Calculate rotational motion using advanced [OBJ:expsec_i9612:rotational motion equations].
2. [OBJ:actsec_jz45:Experiment] with the Angular Surge using advanced rotational motion equations.
3. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_space_capsule_constant_a_question:calculate the final angular velocity] using rotational motion equations.
4. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_i963:tangential velocity].
5. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_golf_club_data_table_question:determine the angular velocity] using tangential velocity.
